meanings.sent1: The old shoes in the closet were quite rammish.
meanings.sent2: The garbage left out for days started to smell rammish.
meanings.sent3: The rammish odor from the gym bag made everyone hold their noses.
meanings.sent4: The alley behind the restaurant was filled with a rammish stench.
meanings.sent5: The rammish aroma of the cheese lingered in the room.

meanings.definition: Resembling a ram in behavior or appearance.
meanings.sent1: His stubborn attitude was quite rammish.
meanings.sent2: The way he charged into the room was rammish.
meanings.sent3: The rammish way he butted heads with his friend was amusing.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was as rammish as a ram on a mountainside.
meanings.sent5: The rammish glare in his eyes showed his frustration.
